trans-unit.source: Base type for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> and any custom conditions created by users.
trans-unit.target: Tipo di base per <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> e qualsiasi condizione personalizzata creata dagli utenti.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene implementato in una classe derivata, inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando se ne esegue l'override in una classe derivata, viene creata una copia completa della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> that is identical to this instance
The runtime context the rule is running in.
trans-unit.target: Contesto runtime in cui la regola viene eseguita.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, evaluates the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene sottoposto a override in una classe derivata valuta la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> evaluated to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per verificare che la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> restituisca <see langword="true" />. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that was used previously in a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> precedentemente utilizzata in una chiamata a <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the dependencies for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando se ne effettua l'override in una classe derivata, ottiene le dipendenze per <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: A list of symbols that represent entities read by the condition.
trans-unit.target: Elenco di simboli che rappresentano le entità lette dalla condizione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: Called when all properties have been given values.
trans-unit.target: Chiamata quando a tutte le proprietà sono stati assegnati valori.

trans-unit.source: After this call, no properties can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Dopo questa chiamata, nessuna proprietà potrà essere modificata.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that is used to manage the validation of rules and rule conditions.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> utilizzata per gestire la convalida di regole e di condizioni di regole.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Quando sottoposta a override in una classe derivata, verifica che la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> sia configurata correttamente e non presenti errori.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> has no errors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per verificare che la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> sia priva di errori. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se l'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> contiene errori (il metodo `Validate` restituisce `false`), la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> conterrà l'elenco degli errori che si sono verificati.
